name: Wyvern Joust Full
description:
Wyvern Joust Full Version

Challenge your friends in the ultimate Wyvern Jousting game!
Up to 4 local-multiplayer, 8 different stages, 4 different wyvern powers.
Terrorize villages and slaughter them to unleash devastating breath's.

Gamepad strongly recommended!!

Any USB or bluetooth gamepad can join!

otherwise:

In menus: Arrows to select, Enter accept, backspace or esc to go back.
Up/Down at wyvern selection screen to select color/power.

1, 2, 3, 4 to add keyboard players.

1st player = WASD, "Z": attack, "X": Fly, "C": Special Power

2nd player = Arrows, "0": attack, ".": Fly, "1": Special Power (Keypad)

3rd player = TFGH, "V": attack, "B": Fly, "N": Special Power

4th player = IJKL, "M": attack, ",": Fly, ".": Special Power

(If there's no more players you only can play 1 minute practice )

Eat Humans for special POWER!

Compete for 5 or 10 kills. Eat humans to gain power.
Roast birds for extra power.

CREDITS

Graphics, design and programming: MacDoom
Music: Aquatarkuss
